item.title: Connection pool + distributed lock = deadlock
item.description: Sometimes you need strong consistency guarantees and transactions can not provide them. Sure, it’s not a good smell, but in this situation you usually don’t have a lot of choices. The easy choice is PostgreSQL advisory lock. But it should be used carefully, especially if you use database connection pools.
